item.title: ROIV
item.description: score:-74 Chances: Roivant Sciences Ltd. has shown promising results in its Phase 1 studies for IMVT-1402, with similar effects to its existing product, Batoclimab. The sale of Telavant to Roche for $7.1B upfront indicates a significant positive financial development for Roivant. The addition of Dr.

item.title: TGTX
item.description: score:73 Chances: TG Therapeutics stock saw a welcome improvement to its Relative Strength (RS) Rating, rising from 87 to 93. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 127.8%. The positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.
